item.title: The Mandalorian Director Reveals She's Talked To Lucasfilm About A Mace Windu Spinoff
item.description: Director of The Mandalorian Bryce Dallas Howard reveals she has discussed the possibility of Star Wars making a Mace Windu spinoff with Lucasfilm.

item.title: Se7en Ending Explained (In Detail)
item.description: David Fincher's 1995 thriller Se7en boasts one of the best shock endings in cinema, but it's far more than a simple twist and an iconic line.

item.title: Win Tickets To See Thunderbolts* In 4DX With ScreenRant!
item.description: ScreenRant presents two exclusive screenings of Thunderbolts* in both New York City and Los Angeles on April 29. Check out how to get tickets here!
